title: WTB - Mayo Cut Plug Baseball - Low Grade/Mid Grade
author: kevinlenane

posts.post_title: WTB - Mayo Cut Plug Baseball - Low Grade/Mid Grade
posts.post_content: Hi im interested in any Mayo Cut Plug baseball cards from the 1890s. Boston is preferable but not necessary. DM me w pic and price. Thanks!

I have a Pfeffer up for auction along with some N284's, N28 Glasscock, and N162 Keefe if you're into other 19th century.

[url]http://m.ebay.com/itm/1895-N300-Mayo-Cut-Plug-Fred-Pfeffer-2nd-Base-SGC-40-3-/172162308039?nav=SEARCH[/url]
Kevin I have a beautiful "3" Cut Plug in my store below.
